body: Im such a hypocrite. I like Neotori but i hate ntr. sad.
YES FUCK NTR(NETORARE) NTR(NETORI) IS THE BEST. FOR THOSE WHO DON'T KNOW NETORI IS THE MAIN CHARACTER  THAT STOLE THE GIRL THAT'S WHY ITS GOOD

She has dead mom haircut. As soon as that kids born, she dead.

Ah, this is much better than the rewrite, I can handle this. The rewrite made me want to crucify the brother, the wife, and the author and let the crows peck out their eyes while they were still alive. Anyways, they'll still get caught b/c the brother has light hair  and she has brown and out will pop a black hair baby (black hair is dominant). lol

Yeah, I wouldn't let any guy live with me and my wife, whether they were family or not. Still always keep this kinda stuff around as reminder that you should put family before work.

Also like hieuzzzzzzzz was trying to say, the person uploaded it without a credits page.

In his defense, she was asking for it just sleeping on the couch. 
 p.s. Lesson: Don't let your family stay with your wife
